Room.Name: Oceanview Drive
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceanview Drive, just south of a very large and busy intersection.
Room.LongDescription: To the north is the intersection of Oceanview Drive, Nagaritha Drive and Eidenhoft Boulevard. The intersection is extremely busy but most people don't stop to talk there. To the east is a fairly new shopping complex. By contrast, the sign above the shop on this side of the road is pretty old and faded. It reads, "Bysantal's General Goods and Services."
